title: What is the best online education academy where I can get a bachelor’s degree? - Quora

response.answer_text: In the UK and some other parts of the world, the answer must be the UK’s Open University. The course materials are generally superb and the OU is highly regarded. It was founded in 1964 and is the UK’s largest educational institution. However, I have to say that only about 8% of its students come from outside the UK.
It depends on the country you are looking for. In US, the ‘big 3″ are the oldest and most non-traditional colleges: The Big Three
